Summary: red sphere illuminated interior floated above sakakawea lake/missouri river
divs: Sighting DetailsFacing west waiting for the fireworks to begin across the lake, when a child said 'look mommy ufo!" I turned my video camera on and observed this red sphere floating from the northwest heading south-southeast it just vanished about maybe 2 minutes afterwards.Granted with noise of fireworks, there was no sound or blinking lites on it as it was definately not aircraft. Monday the 6th, one of my passengers on my bus run told me they saw the same thing that nite over Rice Lake which is about 40 miles straight east. Unfortunately, I am not techno savvy to get this video online.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Minot
There were no other sightings in Minot on or around July 4th 2009
